title: The Prom Queen
description: Dance of death…A spring night…soft moonlight…five beautiful Prom Queen candidates…dancing couples at the Shadyside High prom—these should be the ingredients for romance.But stir in one brutal murder—then another, and another—and the recipe quickly turns to horror.Lizzie McVay realizes that someone is murdering the five Prom Queen candidates one by one—and that she may be next on the list! Can she stop the murderer before the dance is over—for good?
author: R.L. Stine
